spec_data.Name: postgresql-upgrade
spec_data.Description:
The postgresql-upgrade package contains the pg_upgrade utility and supporting
files needed for upgrading a PostgreSQL database from the previous major
version of PostgreSQL.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 09 Nov 2017 11:33:12 AM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Support for upgrading from the previous major release of PostgreSQL
